title: We've detected a problem with your installation
body:
This is the 15th time this month I have had my client crash then say "we've detected a problem with your installation we are attempting to repair now" ever since the ornn patch it has bugged out. It crashes, then crashes my pc while trying to repair, once to the point where o couldn't even boot my computer (had to run bios and repair my pc because of this) 

And, just when I thought, finally it's fixed, new patch, "we've detected a problem with your installation" 3 crashes in past 20 minutes, 4.5gb wasted on nothing, and still doing it.

Just crashed then while I was writing this (on mobile) so 4 crashes and counting trying to "repair" something that was working 5 minutes before.

Please assist with a solution because I am tired of wasting time and data on a game where I get banned for defending myself against vicious abuse.

Trying not to tilt, but it's getting beyond a joke now...

For the love of Frejord help me please!!!


Fillet o Fitz

replies.body:
Hey there,

This sounds like you may have a major issue with your system, especially if you've experienced "crashes" that have caused your system to fail to boot. Drive failure comes to mind as a potential cause.

Perhaps it's time to consider an upgrade?

ot only happens when eague needs to update, and league is the only game/program that causes it, everything else runs smoothly, and it seems to happen when it loads into game (post champ slect) happened again this new patch, updated patch, then crashed when trying to load game fter champ select... its to the point where im just going to uninstall, which is a shame considering the hundreds of dollars i have put into this game thus far

so, this is now happening again, have expended over 20GB today trying to fix this same problem, when EVERY OTHER ASPECT OF MY PC IS RUNNING PERECTLY.

As a result,i have decided to uninstall league, this constant crashing every timea new patch is released, coupled with my being banned for dfending myself, when other players (with lvl 5 honour mind you) have been abusive as f*ck to me, the only soloution is to uninstall the game, as no help (or blame) has been offered or accepted by riot other than telling me to buy a new pc, which, why would i when mine still runs perfectly.

so thanks for all the "help and support" riot, and thank you for finally driving me to uninstall this game, just a shame i cant get the hundreds of dollars wasted, notto mention the countless fees i have incurred by going over data cap trying to fix something that works a minute before then fails.

P.S. I know its not system problems, becuse its the same 3 files that cause it to crash while "repairing" and as stated, every other aspect/program/game work flawlessly... time to go back to Blizzard, at least they have better customer service


Disappointed to say the least,
Another Lost Summoner
